resources.string: Place your fingertip on the scanner to verify your identity
Please place your fingertip on the scanner to verify your identity
(Fingerprint sign in makes your app login much faster. Your device should have at least one fingerprint registered in device settings)
You have successfully logged in with fingerprint authentication
Close and re-open the app to see the fingerprint auth screen again
Please place your fingertip on the camera to verify your identity
Heart rate sign in makes your app login safer
